banner.title: Greetings, my name is Mahay.
banner.description: A Web Developer specializing in Frontend development, dedicated to constructing the user interface and experience for websites and web applications, contributing to the overall success of the product.

aboutTitle.title: About me
aboutTitle.desc: On this page, you'll discover additional details about me, my professional activities, and my current proficiency, primarily focused on programming and technology.

blockInfo.title: Front-End Developer

aboutProjects.title: Projects
aboutProjects.desc: On this page, you'll discover a selection of both personal and client projects that I've developed, and each project comes with its own dedicated case study.

1.title: Wilsonport
1.desc: Wilsonport is a multiservice logistics and transport company and I created their website from scratch using the frontend tools I know.

2.title: Boreal Coffee Clone
2.desc: I re-created the frontend of Boreal Coffee's official web app because I got attracted to their beautiful UI. It was a great experience for me to build the entire frontend.

3.title: Crown Template
3.desc: Crown is a web template that I created targeting the restaurant and food industry which anyone can use to present their business online.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Don't hesitate to reach out by filling out the form below, and I'll respond to you at my earliest convenience.
